languages.text: {n}Идира обхватывает себя руками и покачивается взад-вперед.{/n} "Слепец больше не слушает далекий свет... За ложным золотом у сердца сокрыта мерзость, и она жжет, жжет, жжет!" {n}Псайкерша вздрагивает всем телом.{/n} "Ох, Лорд-капитан, астропат-то наш и впрямь скверне отдался. Я вам клянусь, что-то у него под робой спрятано — то ли амулет, то ли отметина какая нечестивая! И святоши эти оголтелые ее найдут — на живом или на мертвом. Только голосочки смеются, мол, хоть вы предателя и погубите, добра вам от того не будет..."

{n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира обхватывает себя руками и покачивается взад-вперед.{/n} "Слепец больше не слушает далекий свет... За ложным золотом у сердца сокрыта мерзость, и она жжет, жжет, жжет!" {n}Псайкерша вздрагивает всем телом.{/n} "Ох, Лорд-капитан, астропат-то наш и впрямь скверне отдался. Я вам клянусь, что-то у него под робой спрятано — то ли амулет, то ли отметина какая нечестивая! И святоши эти оголтелые ее найдут — на живом или на мертвом. Только голосочки смеются, мол, хоть вы предателя и погубите, добра вам от того не будет..."

languages.text: {n}Idira schlägt die Arme um ihren Körper und schaukelt hin und her.{/n} "Der blinde Mann lauscht nicht länger dem fernen Licht ... Verborgen hinter dem falschen Gott lauern Abscheulichkeiten in seinem Herz, das brennt und brennt und brennt!" {n}Die Psionikerin zittert am ganzen Leib.{/n} "Oh, Mann, Lord Captain. Wie es aussieht, ist unser Astropath nun endgültig der Verderbnis verfallen. Ich schwöre, er verbirgt etwas unter seiner Robe ... ein Amulett oder irgendein unheiliges Symbol. Und diese fanatischen Zeloten werden es an ihm finden ... lebendig oder tot. Aber die Flüsterstimmen lachen. Sie sagen, Ihr könnt den Verräter töten, aber erwartet Euch nichts Gutes davon ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

Wie es aussieht, ist unser Astropath nun endgültig der Verderbnis verfallen. Ich schwöre, er verbirgt etwas unter seiner Robe ... ein Amulett oder irgendein unheiliges Symbol. languages.text: {n}Idira enroule ses bras autour d'elle-même en se balançant d'avant en arrière.{/n} « L'homme aveugle est sourd à la lumière émanant du lointain... Dissimulée derrière les ors factices, l'abomination a gagné son cœur, et il brûle, brûle, brûle ! » {n}Le corps tout entier de la psyker est agité de spasmes fébriles.{/n} « Hélas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, on dirait bien que notre astropathe a succombé à la corruption. Je jurerais qu'il cache quelque chose sous sa robe... quelque amulette ou marque impie, sans doute ! Et ces fanatiques enragés ne manqueront pas de la trouver, qu'il soit mort ou vif. Mais les petites voix rient sous cape, car vous aurez beau tuer le traître, il n'en sortira rien de bon... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

Mais les petites voix rient sous cape, car vous aurez beau tuer le traître, il n'en sortira rien de bon... »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉抱住双臂，身体前后摇摆着。{/n}“盲目之人，再也无法聆听远方的明光……灵魂中的可憎之物，隐藏在虚假的金色光芒之中。那个怪物燃烧着，燃烧着，燃烧着！”{n}伊迪拉整个身体颤抖起来。{/n}“我的天，舰长大人，看来我们那位星语者真的和腐化同流合污了。我敢打赌，他的长袍下面绝对藏了什么东西，要么是护身符，要么是别的什么邪恶印记！那些狂热分子肯定会找到腐化的印记，无论死活。不过，那些低语声放声大笑，它们说你大可以杀掉那个叛徒，但别指望能有什么好结果……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

languages.text: {n}Idira se cubre con sus brazos y se balancea adelante y atrás.{/n} «El ciego ya no escucha la luz distante... Oculta tras el oro falso, la abominación yace en su corazón, y arde, arde, ¡arde!». {n}El cuerpo entero de la psíquica se estremece.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. Parece que la corrupción ha consumido a nuestro Astrópata. Juro que oculta algo bajo su túnica, ¡o un amuleto o algún símbolo impío! Y esos fanáticos rabiosos van a encontrarlo en su cuerpo, vivo o muerto. Pero las pequeñas voces se ríen y dicen que puede matar al traidor, pero que no resultará en nada bueno...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

Oculta tras el oro falso, la abominación yace en su corazón, y arde, arde, ¡arde!». {n}El cuerpo entero de la psíquica se estremece.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. Parece que la corrupción ha consumido a nuestro Astrópata. Juro que oculta algo bajo su túnica, ¡o un amuleto o algún símbolo impío! Y esos fanáticos rabiosos van a encontrarlo en su cuerpo, vivo o muerto. Pero las pequeñas voces se ríen y dicen que puede matar al traidor, pero que no resultará en nada bueno...».

languages.text: {n}イディラは自分の体を抱きしめ、前後に揺れながら言った。{/n}「盲目の男はもはや遠き光に耳を傾けない…偽りの黄金の奥に隠されたその心には、忌まわしきものが潜み、燃えている、燃えている、燃えているの！」{n}その言葉と共に、異能者の全身が震えた。{/n}「あらまあ、ロード・キャプテン。どうやらあたいたちの感応通信官は本当に堕落に取り込まれてしまったみたいね。あのローブの下に何かを隠していると誓って言えるよ。アミュレットか、あるいは不浄な印か！あの狂信者たちは、生きていようが死んでいようが、それを見つけ出すでしょう。でもね、囁き声が笑ってるんだよ。『裏切り者を殺しても、良いことは何も起きない』ってね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

languages.text: {n}Kollarını kavuşturan İdira, ileri geri sallanıyor.{/n} "Kör adamın kulakları, uzak ışığı duymuyor artık... Yalancı altınların ardında bir garabet saklı kalbinde. Yanıyor da yanıyor!" {n}Ruhsezerin tüm vücudu ürperiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Sahiden de yozluğun pençesine düşmüş bizim Astropat. O cübbesinin altında saklı bir şey var, yemin ederim... Ya bir uğurluk ya da bir kâfir simgesi! O gözü dönmüş bağnazlar, ne yapıp edip bulacak onu. Küçük sesler gülüyor bu işe... Haini öldürseniz de hayırlara vesile olmayacakmış..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself, rocking back and forth.{/n} "No more does the blind man listen to the distant light... Concealed behind the false gold, abomination lies at his heart, and it's burning, burning, burning!" {n}The psyker's entire body shudders.{/n} "Oh my, Lord Captain. Looks like our Astropath really is lost to corruption. I swear he's hiding something under that robe of his — either an amulet or some unholy mark! And those rabid zealots are going to find it on him, alive or dead. But the little voices are laughing, saying you may kill the traitor but don't expect any good to come of it..."

Yanıyor da yanıyor!" {n}Ruhsezerin tüm vücudu ürperiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Sahiden de yozluğun pençesine düşmüş bizim Astropat. O cübbesinin altında saklı bir şey var, yemin ederim... Ya bir uğurluk ya da bir kâfir simgesi! O gözü dönmüş bağnazlar, ne yapıp edip bulacak onu. Küçük sesler gülüyor bu işe... Haini öldürseniz de hayırlara vesile olmayacakmış..."
